Caption: Mr. Basu John Vetteth receives the Governor's Prize from Union Minister for Education Mr. M.C. Chagla. The Governer's Prize was a Silver Medal of the value of Rs. 25 given to the best allround student of the B.Tech Degree Course (Curricular and extra-Curricular). Vetteth was called a "bustling aggressive player in the forward line" by K. Shashi Rao in an article 'Seven Years to Hockey Glory'. He was known for running a popular photo studio in Chennai later on in his life.
